about_the_game:
Welcome to Magic Inn

Imagine Fae Farm's magic combined with Travellers Rest's cozy simulation. Build and customize your dream tavern, managing menus, staff, and rooms. Use Potionomics-inspired card battles to connect with guests and build meaningful relationships on your journey.

The prologue is free and includes a part of the main character’s story, which takes place in one of the three kingdoms, Kingdom Crop. Uncover the truth behind the tragedy that befell your family, reclaim the reputation of the wizarding community and rescue the princess in order to return to the Magic Castle.


Key Features:

  • Embark on a journey about tragedy and redemption, all starting with a magical humble inn.

  • Manage the menus, staff, and rooms of your completely customizable inn.

  • Learn and harness magic spells in order to help with inn management.

  • Engage in conversation-driving card battles which simulate actions such as negotiation, persuasion, and attraction.

  • Build relationships with guests and members of the inn’s staff.

  • Collect magical creatures and items as you journey through this enchanted universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100T, AMD Ryzen 3 2300X, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD Radeon R9, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600, AMD Ryzen 5 3400, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 580, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Reclaim glory in Magic Inn, a charming tavern life simulator. Take on the role of an exiled wizard-turned-innkeeper, overseeing everything from menus, rooms, guests, and staff in a fully magical customizable inn. Engage in card battles to spark conversations and foster relationships with guests.
